department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: This project is for office relocation services within NCR
description: The services needed include office moving, packing, crating, disassembling, loading, transporting, unloading, unpacking, uncrating, assembling and cleanup. Services are needed in Gatieneau if only needed for Gatieneau.
full_summary:
# Office Relocation within the National Capital Region
### Reference Information
- **Reference Number**: WS4407238757-Doc4407287170
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4407238757
- **Publication Date**: January 23, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: February 12, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
- **Amendment Date**: January 22, 2024

### Tender Information
- **Procurement Category**: *SRV* (Services)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
- **Trade Agreements**: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*
- **Regions of Opportunity**: None
- **Regions of Delivery**: *National Capital Region (NCR)*

### Tender Description
The Government of Canada invites bidders to submit a Supply Arrangement for the provision of relocation, warehousing, and related services to Departmental and Agency offices within the National Capital Region. The services required include, but are not limited to:

- Full office suite relocations
- Office equipment and furniture moving
- Records and files management
- Computer hardware relocation
- Boardroom and kitchen setup
- Packing, crating, disassembling, loading, transporting, unloading, unpacking, uncrating, assembling, and cleanup at the end of each move

### Contracting Entity
- **Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information
- **Name**: Jiang, Kevin (SPAC/PSPC) (he/him)
- **Email**: [kevin.jiang@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kevin.jiang@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18586623?extsite=MTg1ODY2MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18586623?extsite=MTg1ODY2MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

The services required are subject to the terms and conditions outlined in the Supply Arrangement documents. Interested bidders should consult the attached documents for more information
